post.text: Get out and VOTE -- we need everyone -- and if you all get to the polls -- we will WIN! Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Catherine
comment.text: Mr Trump , You have our Support 120% .. We will Vote Trump in great Numbers !! That is all We can do but Please be vigilant in the Investigation of Voter Fraud .. It is the only way they can beat US !

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: We can help -let's each visit our own neighborhoods and respectfully ask for votes for Trump, answer any concerns and explain what real jeopardy our country is in especially the Constitution - that we cannot afford 4 more years of Obama's corruption. Ask what do we have to lose by believing in this successful business man who loves his country enough to spend his own fortune and time to help make the ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ great again. Look at the energy of this man who would actually work on our behalf! Surely we can do our part going door to door to help him spread the word!!

replies.author: Peyton
replies.text: Trump has ma permision to grab ma wifs and dauters pussy. No problem by me Mr President. Dem pols r rigged. Libtards wil never take ma gunz. Dis Merica damit. As boss man the Don should have every right to grab his employers pussy as he makes the big bucks and provides them wit a check.
